statements: SELECT city, country, temperature, weather_condition FROM WeatherForecast;
SELECT city, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT city, country FROM WeatherForecast WHERE weather_condition='Sunny';
SELECT city, country, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE country='Canada' AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT city, country, temperature, weather_condition FROM WeatherForecast WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT city, country, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 10 AND weather_condition = 'Rainy' ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT city, country, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM WeatherForecast GROUP BY city, country HAVING avg_temp > 20
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM WeatherForecast ORDER BY country
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT location_id, date, humidity FROM weather_forecast WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM location_data JOIN weather_forecast ON location_data.location_id = weather_forecast.location_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM location_data LEFT JOIN weather_forecast ON location_data.location_id = weather_forecast.location_id WHERE humidity IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_forecast;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM weather_forecast GROUP BY location_id HAVING num_records > 5 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY location_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%'
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM locations l JOIN weather_forecasts w ON l.location_id = w.location_id
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature FROM weather_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT u.username, l.address FROM users u INNER JOIN user_locations ul ON u.id = ul.user_id INNER JOIN locations l ON ul.location_id = l.id;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_forecast GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT users.username, locations.address FROM users JOIN user_locations ON users.id = user_locations.user_id JOIN locations ON locations.id = user_locations.location_id
SELECT location_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM weather_forecast GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE city LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC, wind_speed ASC;
SELECT city_name, region FROM cities ORDER BY city_name ASC;
